text: Two small business owners were recognized for their work in Racine. Great to recognize those who are providing jobs in our community.
Thank you to the firefighters in Whitewater for your work to keep our communities safe!
American families are getting clobbered by rising prices. The number one thing we could be doing is unleashing American energy. @FoxNews
I’ll be joining Janesville’s @wclo1230 at 9:15am CT tomorrow. Tune in!
Wisconsin families including family-owned businesses are getting hit by rising costs a supply chain crisis and worker shortages. We need to change course and get our economy back on track.
